name: Ritz
storyline: Your cool ass boy Ritz the rat has just been RATTED out by the anti-rat crew. His cheese gone...His hunger rising....help this rat get his fukken cheese back in the lair of illusions.
summary: Created by Ninjamuffin, Ritz is a 2-D Platformer starring Ritz, a RADICAL mouse with nice shades. He has a friend who LOVES cheese, and you need to feed him it. Collect Cheese and open the gate to escape the labyrinth. Ritz was created in HaxelFlixel and is Open Source.
